title: ST. MARTiiNS – Jazzboy : ur so pretty
body:
Funny how life comes full circle sometimes.

Before I even started writing this blog, I saw a group of five school age teenagers play an electrifying show at a battle of the bands in Dundee; fast forward seven or eight years, and the two founding members of the group are now carving out their own lane as ST.MARTiiNS. Their unique brand of off-kilter indie pop is quite rightly drawing praise and setting them up for a mightily exciting 2019. Check out recent singles, ur so pretty and Jazzboy below.
